title: [MEDIUM] WebSocket state race condition
description:
File: packages/moe-proxy/src/index.ts

Issue: isConnected and ws.readyState can desync.

Fix: Always check both before sending.

implementationPlan.description: Create isSafeToSend() helper that checks both isConnected and ws.readyState
Replace all isConnected checks with isSafeToSend()
